thread.title: Avani Barbarons Hotel in Seychelles welcomes new GM
thread.title_full: Avani Barbarons Hotel in Seychelles welcomes new GM

author: eTN Editor
title: Avani Barbarons Hotel in Seychelles welcomes new GM
text:
Avani Barbarons Hotel in Seychelles welcomes new GM Adv: 
Jul 08, 2015 Adv: 
Manish Jha, the outgoing General Manager of the Seychelles AVANI Barbarons Hotel, and Thomas Barguil, the resort's new General Manager, paid a courtesy call on Alain St.Ange, the Seychelles Minister responsible of Tourism and Culture, at his ESPACE Offices in Victoria. Also present during this meeting were Anne Lafortune, the PS for Tourism; Benjamine Rose, the PS for Culture; and Sherin Naiken, the CEO of the Tourism Board. 
Seychelles is a founding member of the International Coalition of Tourism Partners (ICTP) . Source: Seychelles Ministry of Tourism and Culture
